messages.text: I posted this on <#C6A044SQH|helpdesk>, but perhaps here is a better place. Does somebody know whether julia works on RHEL6?

elements.text: , but perhaps here is a better place. Does somebody know whether julia works on RHEL6?

attachments.title: The Debian tech committee allows Kubernetes vendoring
attachments.text: Back in October, LWN looked at a conversation within the Debian project regarding whether it was permissible to ship Kubernetes bundled with some 200 dependencies. The Debian technical committee has finally come to a conclusion on this matter: this bundling is acceptable and the maintainer will not be required to make changes:
attachments.fallback: The Debian tech committee allows Kubernetes vendoring

messages.text:
While running the ./configure I get a warning that `Makefile.export.somepackages` can't be found. Hence it's using the predefined values. However it is present in the `include` dir specified by CXXFLAG.

Are export files supposed to be in a different directory?
I couldn't find any flags to specify it either

What can be done?
